name: Hungry Squirrel
description:
Use your mouse to point to where you want to move to try and keep a balance between starvation and eating a little to many acorns to keep this squirrels uncontrollable hunger  in check while avoiding violent moles!

Hope you enjoy the game!

Both music and sound effects by Eric Matyas:

www.soundimage.org

Made for the GMTK 2020  game jam.
